Main: ^Oh! How did you get in here? Or even make it all the way up here?

s: ^I did some parkour to get up here!

Upgrade: ^I see, you met my colleague outside.
^Well anyways, we have been stuck down here trying to plug this cable in for a while now. But we just don't have the strength to get it into the socket, could you help us out?
Parkour: ^Impressive for someone of your size. Anyways we have been stuck down here trying to plug this cable in for a while now. But use three down here aren't strong enough to get it done.
^Could you help us out to try and get the Kettle working again?
OFC:
^That is great to hear!

^Could you stand right over there and lift on three?




end
